name: Delete a book with an invalid token

steps.name: Given I have a valid user and a book with ISBN "9781449325862" in their collection
And I set an invalid token
When I send a DELETE request to remove book with ISBN "9781449325862"
Then the response status code should be 401
And the response should contain "User not authorized!"

fullName: Book Store API functionality: Delete a book with an invalid token
